thread.title: The Internet Actually Predicted the Timing of BeyoncĂŠ’s Pregnancy Announcement
thread.title_full: The Internet Actually Predicted the Timing of BeyoncĂŠ’s Pregnancy Announcement

author: Raisa Bruner
title: The Internet Actually Predicted the Timing of BeyoncĂŠ’s Pregnancy Announcement
text:
Beyoncé kicked off February on a high note, shocking fans by revealing her pregnancy in an artfully photographed Instagram post. 
But maybe that announcement didn’t come out of left field. Maybe the internet has been expecting something like this to happen all along. Maybe, in fact, Twitter user @beyoncefan666 has been saying since July 2016 that the Lemonade Queen would make just this kind of a public statement to stop the world in February 2017.
Yep, that’s the case:
Okay so Beyoncé is gonna announce a pregnancy in February(2017)
— . (@beyoncefan666) July 22, 2016 
Naturally, people are shook that this prescient tweet exists. 
@beyoncefan666 pic.twitter.com/J5OC6XnK2O 
— tk (@blondvsn) February 1, 2017 
@JorCru @blondvsn pic.twitter.com/f1BIPoibuh 
— ㅤ (@ghostindamirror) February 1, 2017 
@JorCru @ghostindamirror @blondvsn pic.twitter.com/TEeMzV1bhW
